org.freehep.graphicsio.pdf

Class PDFFontEmbedder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.freehep.graphicsio.font.FontIncluder
      • org.freehep.graphicsio.font.FontEmbedder
        • org.freehep.graphicsio.pdf.PDFFontEmbedder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PDFFontEmbedderType3

    public abstract class PDFFontEmbedder
extends FontEmbedder
    Superclass of all FontEmbedders for PDF documents. Subclasses must implement all abstract methods which are called in the following order:
    • addAdditionalEntries
    • addAdditionalInitDicts
    • writeGlyph once for each glyph in the order of the encoding
    Version:
    $Id: freehep-graphicsio-pdf/src/main/java/org/freehep/graphicsio/pdf/PDFFontEmbedder.java f493ff6e61b2 2005/12/01 18:46:43 duns $
    Author:
    Simon Fischer

        protected String getReference()
